agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Energy Resources TIME & DATE: 2:00 PM or upon final adjourn./recess Wednesday, February 6, 2019 PLACE: E1.030 CHAIR: Rep. Chris Paddie The House Energy Resources Committee will meet jointly with the House Natural Resources Committee to discuss the current status of water use in oil and gas production. The Committee will also review various technologies association with the recycle and reuse of water in oil and gas production. Invited testimony only. The agenda will be available at the hearing. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
